WorkItem.Description:
I have used this method to get attributes  for a given entity, example: salesorder

    what I observed is some attributes are missing  for example customerid is not there. Instead of customer id

there are other attributes   __CustomerIdYomiName__,__CustomerIdType__,__CustomerIdName    except  CustomerId__

  I think these attributes have been retrived from CRM Database, but  when I checked database, CustomerId column is there.

I think it will be really useful if the columns match with the columns available in CRM Entity.

Please check this one. I am struck with something which needed to be completed.

Hope you understood above  Issue.

Comments.Message:
usage of method

** Closed by jaimieji 9/26/2013 5:44 AM

Hi There.

I have tested the code and have no problems to return customerid using the method.

var entityMetadata = XrmServiceToolkit.Soap.RetrieveEntityMetadata(["Attributes"], "salesorder", true);

If you can try to use the latest version of the software, let me know the results.

Jaimie
